item.title: How do i create a silab server without having to use a hamachi
item.dc:creator: @IP1 IP
item.description:
@IP1 wrote:

Try pressing the reset button on your router, or unplug it and replug it in. Additionally, if it still does not work, contact your Network Administrator, or your ISP host or call up the company you bought the router from.

Disclaimer: Anything that happens to your router is not my responsibility.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i create a silab server without having to use a hamachi
item.dc:creator: @IP1 IP
item.description:
@IP1 wrote:

Register at no-ip.com, create a domain name; i.e. example.no-ip.org

Then have example.no-ip.org be the IP address your client connects too. Set the port via client and server, then log in and edit your server. Voila!

Read full topic
